steps.description: 1. Fill the 2×2 empty hole inside the upper-left hollow 4×4 square (the inner hole of the top big square) with color 4 — color its four interior cells yellow.

2. Complete the lower-left foot: the small L-shaped trio of green pixels attached beneath/left of the lower hollow square has one empty cell that would make a full 2×2 block — color that single empty cell yellow (color 4).
3. Complete the lower-right foot: the small foot cluster at the extreme lower-right is missing one cell to become a 2×2 block — color that single empty cell yellow (color 4).
